documents.document: @jpstacey @greg_harvey but they could use straws...

@greg_harvey @number10gov it was me.

Me to 8y/o son: "So do you know why people don't like Trump?"
"Because he's a racist arse-face."
Nailed it.
@rhapsodyearth @brodiescoffee thank you :-)
THIS IS WHY I MARRIED HER! https://t.co/01innmfO4J
@lewisnyman @salva_bg iRig + headphone jack sounds ideal :-)
@lewisnyman I’d say it’s good for figuring out a sound you want to emulate, but you probably want the real thing if you’re gigging.
@lewisnyman I have it hooked up to small speakers for practice. You’ll get some background hiss from the tiny cable, but not too offensive.
@CodeClub you lovely people. Thanks :-)
@CodeClub any way to get hold of some of those posters for our club?
@salva_bg right up there with git commit -m “.”
@galooph @chinnyhill10 and you'd be right 🙂😔

"Who's that grinning on the far right?"
"They all are." https://t.co/6IPgg0fp9H
FAKE NEWS https://t.co/hC6F413v0J
@greg_harvey @eli_t life enriched by art!
The joys of java based KVM console, with a non-native keyboard layout. If I’ve turned grey(er) by the end of today, that’ll be why.
@greg_harvey she's not wrong. You didn't tell her it's me did you?
@_mig5 just a reliable indicator of Drupal version might be nice!
@_mig5 D8 uses ‘drush cr’ and doesn’t like ‘cc all’.
@alvesadrian finally! A legit reason for that dedicated GPU in my MacBook!
@mikebell_ Soft Brexit means Soft Brexit. Obviously ;-)
@jpoesen a few years??!
@greg_harvey @kiwimind soon as I have Code Club, I’ll know what the next irritating meme is.
@greg_harvey with @emlynk it’s really more “$%#!!” than “zzzzzz” /cc @galooph
3 kids in the house. All armed with nerf guns. #sendgin #idontevendrink #itsforthem
@greg_harvey @rupertjabelman @galooph ours has 8, but I think it’s tricked out.
@rupertjabelman @greg_harvey @galooph nice thing about those 2009 machines is that they’re upgradeable https://t.co/SZlNSVyzmU
@greg_harvey ps. Should I be asking you to raise tickets? ;-)
@greg_harvey If you have access to the app store you can download an image to dd onto a usb stick.
@greg_harvey @galooph obvious caveats: friend isn’t going to be doing heavy video editing or gaming, I guess.
@greg_harvey @galooph Yep. Nathan’s still using a 2009 machine (not that Nathan). Whack an SSD in it and it’ll fly.

"But they're contributing to the economy, how is that a bad thing?"....
"You'll think of something". https://t.co/up3HnAE8Px
Just back from Rogue One for the second time, and seen the news. I think that's finished me.
@RC_Garrick did... did you steal the cups from KFC?!
@jpstacey vomiting spells in the Harry Potter sense?
@jpoesen someone needs to appease a different god. Maybe not one from a desert.
@jpoesen lambs?! In winter?!
@galooph @mikebell_ no good raisin for confection based puns.
Watching my wife put VR Swedish furniture together has to have been this year's highlight.
@RC_Garrick IT'S GOOD MILK, RACHEL.
First Bowie, now this. https://t.co/fZCiZsRLx5
@RC_Garrick tbh most of them are just poop. It's funny when you're 8.
@RC_Garrick we have entire conversations in emoji with ours, now. Maybe less sweet....
@rupertjabelman it's okay, found them. https://t.co/bz1JZRYCcj
@emlynk @greg_harvey @galooph ISC meeting pondering disaster recovery scenarios, and it turned dark very quickly…
@timmillwood @rupertjabelman ITYM glass twice the size it needs to be ;-)
@timmillwood @rupertjabelman those were the days. Unlimited free on-call hours. No job security. jQuery everywhere.
First Bowie, and now this. https://t.co/WhS9a4koXd
@RC_Garrick trying not to take it personally ;-)
@emlynk *mutters about sysadmins on holiday* /cc @galooph @greg_harvey @valdanial
@irithnu @emlynk Just seen battlenet supports voice chat natively. I might just make a channel :P
@irithnu yeah that’d work. Wasn’t sure if you moved onto discord or something. 1pm okay?
@irithnu sounds like a plan. What do you use for comms?
This has made me happy today. https://t.co/b3b5ryzmv4
@greg_harvey @_mig5 of course there are also HA failover events…
@quidco you absolute bloody legends :-)
@quidco u ok hun? need some help with hosting? ;-)
@rc_garrick best bet is central station parking. You’d be welcome to our visitor permit, but it’s a bit of a walk…
@emlynk get off my lawn!
@skwashd yeah, sorry about that. It's not getting any better tonight. 😐
@RhapsodyEarth @RC_Garrick it's quite hard to breathe through, though..
@EmlynK thank you young man. Hope it's not too much on fire there.
@galooph alfresco dining in Cardiff, in November. Of course.
Morning! Tea? Coffee? Juice? https://t.co/HJsdwiZrc4

@mcjim thank you, sir!
@alvesadrian thank you, sir.

Been trying hard to remember childhood truce words from Where I grew up. Pretty sure we had 'cross keys'. /cc @_mig5 @monkeyjen
Talking about uniquely childhood language - "Cree" meaning "safe" in a game of tag. Anyone else have anything similar from their area?
@RC_Garrick @GarrickBad we'll bring cards against humanity. And headphones for the kids. /cc @RhapsodyEarth
@RC_Garrick @GarrickBad pretty sure it's white and gold...
@EmlynK saw this, thought of you. https://t.co/OJCZ2eFlNg
@greg_harvey what @emlynk said. Break a leg, hope it all goes well.
@jpoesen and vice versa, if you listen to my son.
Haribo is a kind of fruit, right?
@ann__w why thank you. Sorry @rc_garrick and @GarrickBad ;-) /cc @rhapsodyearth
